actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-482.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 314 - 86 (Record Vote No: 41).

official_title: A resolution providing for amending the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3128) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 2 of the first concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1986 (S.Con.Res. 32, Ninety-ninth Congress).

summary.text: Provides, with respect to the consideration of H.R. 3128 (spending and revenue provisions), that the House shall be considered to have: (1) receded from its disagreement to the Senate amendment thereto; and (2) concurred in the Senate amendment with an amendment.

titles.title: A resolution providing for amending the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3128) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 2 of the first concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1986 (S.Con.Res. 32, Ninety-ninth Congress).
